fields.name: Yellow Upholstered Fireside Chair
fields.description: This beautiful yellow chair is perfect for beside the fire. Reupholstered in gorgeous textured weave fabric by Tina, it has dark wooden legs and a deep comfortable seat.  It will look fabulous pretty much anywhere! This chair is luxurious and hard wearing and the vintage style and shape is full of warm curves and rich detailing. This chair can be placed by the fireside, in a living room or the hallway.  Dimensions: Height: 62cm, Seat Height: 45cm, Width: 64cm, Depth: 74cm.

fields.name: Windsor Style Side Chair in Dark Wood
fields.description: This chair is a classic windsor style design.  It has been fully restored to its former glory by Peter.  This chair features sunken saddle seats, solid wood design, and a round-tenoned back and legs. This chair works perfectly as a dining chair, hall chair, or bedroom side chair. Dimensions: Height: 88cm, Seat Height: 48cm, Width: 44cm, Depth: 44cm.

fields.name: Set of Four Wooden Bar Stools with Black Leather Seats
fields.description: These oak bar stools have been lovingly restored by Olaf.  The black padded seating adds comfort and style to these beautifully restored pieces.  They will look perfect beside a kitchen island or in a commercial space.

fields.name: Armchair with Retro Vibes in Peach Velvet
fields.description: This fabulous peach retro armchair has been reupholstered by Tina in a sumptuous soft velvet. The legs are coated in gold which contrast beautifully with the velvet fabric.  This chair is supremely comfortable and would make a wonderful addition to any reading corner or living space. Dimensions: Height: 62cm, Seat Height: 45cm, Width: 64cm, Depth: 74cm.

fields.name: Brown Leather Armchairs
fields.description: These beautiful brown leather armchairs have been reupholstered by Tina in a luxurious soft leather. The legs are coated in black which contrast wonderfully with the leather seating.  These chairs are comfortable and stylish and would make a wonderful addition to a commercial reception area or any home living space. Dimensions: Height: 62cm, Seat Height: 45cm, Width: 64cm, Depth: 74cm.

fields.name: Round Marble Table with Metal Upholstered Chairs
fields.description: This table and chair set has been restored beautifully by Tina.  The round table has a stylish and practical marble top and a gold metal base.  The chairs have been reupholstered in a brown faux leather fabric which is very practical and easy to clean.  These pieces would work perfectly in a kitchen dining area.

fields.name: Mahogany Table and Chairs
fields.description: This table and chair set has been carefully restored by Pat.  The round table has a smooth mahogany finish.  There are four chairs in the set and they are also finished in a mahogany stain. This set would work perfectly in any dining area.

fields.name: Writing Desk in Walnut
fields.description: This writing desk has been restored by Pat.  The desk is made of walnut and would fit perfectly in any bedroom area.  There is a pull down area with three drawers on top and two underneath.
